# Developmental Evaluator of ARCH Sites 2

**Solicitation Reference**: cb-6693-83228000, Amendment 2

## Official Description

This tender announcement solicits bids for the position of Developmental Evaluator of ARCH Sites 2. The solicitation is issued by Infrastructure Canada (INFC) and is part of the ARCH (Action Research on Chronic Homelessness) initiative. The evaluators will support two communities participating in the ARCH initiative to identify and address persistent barriers to preventing and reducing chronic homelessness.

## Description of Requirement

The successful bidder will provide a Developmental Evaluator or a Developmental Evaluation Project Team to support the ARCH research project at two selected sites. The evaluators will work collaboratively with INFC, community stakeholders, and Indigenous partners to identify common expectations and communication protocols. The scope of the work includes:

* Designing and implementing a developmental evaluation framework
* Collecting and analyzing project information
* Identifying and assessing progress, challenges, and effectiveness of the ARCH research project
* Providing rapid and real-time recommendations and advice
* Sharing developmental evaluation findings and recommendations with stakeholders

## Evaluation Criteria

The selection process will be based on the highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit (80%) and Price (20%), including travel costs for the Summative Researcher.

## Exigences de SÉCURITÉ

TPSGC #9 Cote de fiabilité.

## Bidder Information

The tender is open to the bidders who have been pre-qualified as part of the Services Professionnels Centrés sur les Tâches et les Solutions (SPTS) arrangement. Interested bidders should submit their bid documents by July 10, 2023.
